body: You feel great anger at anyone who dares to attack you, and this fury makes your own attacks that much stronger.
name: Grudge Fighter
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Orcs/New Racial Rules/Orc Feats/Grudge Fighter

sections.body: You gain a +1 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls made against any creature that attacked you in the current combat.
sections.name: Benefit
